name: How to Hold On
description:
This game came from an idea I had after a job rejection. I was feeling pretty good beforehand as I had been finally getting my feet under me after a fairly long period of depression and anxiety. But after the rejection I could feel myself slip into the same thought patterns of hopelessness I had felt before I had begun getting help. But thanks to the help I had received I caught these thoughts before I fell into a spiral. In this moment I realised I really wanted to hold on to the progress I had made but it was going to be hard to that. So I made a game about that feeling.

Controls:

- press the keys displayed on the limbs to hold on

- click and hold left mouse to pull limbs and climb

- escape to close the game

Music from https://filmmusic.io
